titleStmt.title: Theeves, theeves, or, A relation of Sir Iohn Gell's proceedings in Darbyshire, in gathering up the rents of the lords and gentlemen of that county by pretended authority from the two Houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "May. 1st first at Oxon".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
